intro: Digitaria valida, commonly known as the valid grass, is a flowering plant belonging to the Poaceae family. It is a perennial grass native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas. The plant typically grows in open, sunny habitats such as grasslands and disturbed soils. It has narrow, linear leaves and produces small, spike-like inflorescences. Digitaria valida is often used in ecological restoration projects due to its ability to stabilize soil and support local wildlife.
